mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT FROM t_book b,t_author a,t_book_author ba WHERE b.book_id =ba.book_id AND a.author_id=ba.author_id AND b.book_id =#{bookId}
SELECT c.comment_content ,u.user_name,u.user_email,c.comment_datatime FROM t_comment c,t_book b ,t_user u WHERE c.book_id=b.book_id and u.user_id = c.user_id and b.book_id =#{book_id}
select user_id,book_id from t_user_book where user_id=#{userId} and book_id=#{bookId}
select DISTINCT book_name,book_category,book_id,book_cover_image from t_book where book_category=#{bookCategory};

SELECT b.book_sales_price,b.book_id,a.activity_discount,a.activity_start,a.activity_end ,((a.activity_discount*b.book_sales_price)/100)as discount_price FROM t_book b,t_activity a,t_activity_books ab where b.book_id = ab.book_id and a.activity_id = ab.activity_id and a.activity_id IN (SELECT activity_id FROM t_activity WHERE NOW() < activity_end and NOW() > activity_start) and b.book_id =#{bookId}
SELECT b.book_id,a.author_name from t_book b,t_author a,t_book_author ab WHERE b.book_id =ab.book_id AND a.author_id=ab.author_id AND b.book_id =#{bookId}
mapper.update: update t_comment set comment_reply = #{commentReply},comment_reply_datatime=#{commentReplyDataTime} where book_id = #{bookId} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select book_id,stock_num from v_stock where book_id =#{bookId}
